title: Canberra today and tomorrow
brief_description: The rapidly developing capital city of Australia. Its beautiful site and many parks and gardens; national traditions enshrined in the Australian War Memorial, the Royal Military College of Duntroon and in Parliament House. The diplomatic missions, Canberra University College, research institutions. The corporate life of the city and plans for its future.
